/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a pedestrian's viewpoint on the sidewalk, immersing the viewer in the city's daily life. The street is lined with trees and buildings, creating a canopy of greenery and architecture that stretches into the distance. The sky above is a clear blue, providing a vibrant backdrop to the urban landscape. Cars and buses traverse the road, adding a dynamic element to the scene. The image is bathed in the light of day, highlighting the colors and details of the cityscape.
